name: Elimination
description: Achieve victory by eliminating all opponents in this round-based mode.

modifiers.name: Elimination Rules
modifiers.description:
To win, your team must become the last Guardian(s) standing by defeating the entire opposing team.

Tiebreaker: A capture zone appears when a round reaches overtime. Win the round by capturing the zone before the other team.

name: Rumble
description: Achieve victory by defeating opponents. No teams. No allegiance. A free-for-all where the leader had better watch their back.

name: Team Scorched
description: Everyone on both teams has a Scorch Cannon. Be brave.

modifiers.name: Team Scorched Rules
modifiers.description:
To win, defeat your opponents to score more points than them! Every player is equipped with a Scorch Cannon.

Scorch Cannon: A heavy-impact weapon borrowed from the Eliksni. Shots can detonate on impact or can be charged by holding and releasing the actuator for a larger explosion.

modifiers.name: Increased Crucible Rank
modifiers.description: All Crucible Rank point gains are increased!

modifiers.name: Matchmaking
modifiers.description: Matchmaking does not utilize skill.

name: Competitive
description: Matches in this playlist affect your Competitive Division placement. Wins will lead to Promotions, increasing your Division placement. Losses will lead to Relegations, lowering your Division placement.

modifiers.name: Competitive Division Rules
modifiers.description:
This playlist contains Collision and Survival. When you launch, it will randomly select one of the modes for you to play.

Collision: To win, score more points than your opponents by capturing and controlling the zone. There will be one zone active at a time. Defeating your opponents does not directly grant points.

Survival: To win, your team must become the last Guardian(s) standing by defeating the opposing team to exhaust their revives.

modifiers.description:
Complete placement matches to determine your starting position on the current Season's Ranked ladder.

modifiers.name: Shaxx's Training Weights
modifiers.description: Ability Cooldowns Increased

name: Gambit
description: Defeat the enemies of humanity, collect their Motes, and bank them to summon a Primeval. First team to destroy their Primeval wins.

modifiers.name: Gambit Rules
modifiers.description:
To win, be the first team to summon and defeat your Primeval. 

Motes: Defeated foes will drop Motes you can pick up. Watch out! If you die, you'll lose any Motes you're holding. 

Bank: Deposit Motes you're holding in the bank. Bank enough Motes, and you'll summon a Primeval. 

Blockers: Bank enough Motes at once to summon Blockers that lock the opposing team's bank. 

Invasions: As your team banks Motes, an invasion portal will open, allowing you to enter the opposing team's area. Take them out to make them drop their Motes!

name: Competitive
description: Matches in this playlist affect your Competitive Division placement. Wins will lead to Promotions, increasing your Division placement. Losses will lead to Relegations, lowering your Division placement.

modifiers.name: Competitive Division Rules
modifiers.description:
This playlist contains Collision and Survival. When you launch, it will randomly select one of the modes for you to play.

Collision: To win, score more points than your opponents by capturing and controlling the zone. There will be one zone active at a time. Defeating your opponents does not directly grant points.

Survival: To win, your team must become the last Guardian(s) standing by defeating the opposing team to exhaust their revives.

modifiers.name: Placement Series
modifiers.description:
Complete placement matches to determine your starting position on the current Season's Ranked ladder.

Matches played: {var:4027254163} of {var:2701182729}

modifiers.name: Notswap
modifiers.description: Swapping Exotic armor or ammo type in the Kinetic or Energy weapon slot drains all ability energy.

modifiers.name: Increased Crucible Rank
modifiers.description: All Crucible Rank point gains are increased!

modifiers.name: Matchmaking
modifiers.description: Matchmaking prefers players with similar Competitive Rank.
